issues.title: Pro-Life Legislation
issues.description: Strong supporter of restrictive abortion laws, advocating for significant limitations on reproductive rights

issues.title: Education Funding
issues.description: Supports school choice, charter schools, and redirecting public education funds to alternative educational options

issues.title: Conservative Immigration Policy
issues.description: Supports strict border control, opposes sanctuary city policies, and advocates for stricter immigration enforcement

issues.title: Tax Reduction
issues.description: Advocates for lower tax rates, reduced government spending, and business-friendly fiscal policies

issues.title: Second Amendment Protection
issues.description: Strong defender of gun rights, opposes gun control legislation, supports expanded concealed carry laws

issues.title: Healthcare Deregulation
issues.description: Supports market-driven healthcare solutions, opposes expanded government healthcare programs

issues.title: Environmental Regulation Reduction
issues.description: Advocates for reducing environmental regulations to support business growth
issues.source: Florida State Legislature Environmental Committee Records
